title: Vaccine Peer Review: The History of the Global Vaccination Program in 1000 Peer Reviewed Reports and Studies, 1915-2015 (Jan. 7, 2016)
cleaned_text:
Vaccine Peer Review: The History of the Global Vaccination Program in 1000 Peer Reviewed Reports and Studies, 1915-2015

 "Vaccines are responsible for an epidemic of disease and disorder in the human system"

 Jeff Prager, Founder & Pub. Senior Magazine

Facebook Censorship

 To post this article on Facebook, link to the TinyUrl seen below. Facebook will remove any article identified as coming from educate-yourself.org

 http://tinyurl.com/gmqbn3x

Vaccine Peer Review: The History of the Global Vaccination Program in 1000 Peer Reviewed Reports and Studies, 1915-2015 (Jan. 7, 2016)

Provides a cogent and compelling argument that vaccines are responsible for an epidemic of disease and disorder in the human system using only published, accepted peer review from 100s of authors representing many dozens of specialties and from across the globe. The PDF is free, there is no print version.

Feel free to share it or post it.
